reviewText: I wanted to be the very best, like no one ever was. To combat them is my real test, to cycle is my cause. I will cycle across the land, searching far and wide, Each bicycle combat tactic to understand and release the power that's inside. Bicycle, its you and me; I know it's my destiny. Bicycle, oh, you're my best friend, in a world we must DEFEND! Bicycle, a video so true, my legs will pull us through. This video taught me and I'll teach you. Bicycle, got to combat them all. Every challenger along the way, with courage I will face. I will combat every day to claim my rightful place. Ride with me, the time is right there's no better team. Foot in pedal, we'll win the fight, it's always been our dream.

Okay, read this review before getting the movie.

If you are looking to buy a movie to help up your self defense game, look elsewhere... far far far away from this video.

It really does just look like a bunch of guys playing around with bikes.

BUT!!! If you are like me, and enjoy watching poorly made movies, then get this.
Its entertaining the same way super-low-budget scifi movies are entertaining.

Everything that makes this movie bad is what makes the movie funny. I found myself watching this with friends over and over again because of how ridiculous some of the scenes were.

Like I said, if you want to learn some crazy fighting moves, you aren't going to find them here, but if you want to watch a poorly made self defense video. You've come to the right place.
The video is of two people clumsily swing a bike around on its back wheel. It reminds me of a fight scene from a home made movie.
It's pretty good if you know some marshal arts to incorporate with it.  Head but with a good helmet is probably a good option.
